column4: trader joe's, or maybe they had one in pitt when we lived there.
At any rate Cali sucks, I can't wait to get back home but hopefully before the weather gets horrible.
I don't know maybe it's a buffalo thing.
like walmarts, kmarts, etc.
and everything is "down this house, down that house" in Pitt. Haha
Go back to an older update and hope for the best?
Sorry that's not good advice.
I'm surprized how stable my Edgy install is.
It's kind of spooky in a way.
Maybe it was out here, sethk.
i maybe would be surprised if wlan would run :-((
Me and ubuntu have a very long history of beating each other up, so this working flawlessly the first time is kind of disturbing.
hehe.. i have a history like that, too
Albiet the update manager with 7 minutes left disappeared and I had to do a dist-upgrade the rest of the way through but other then that, flawless.
hehe.. at work dapper -> edgy worked almost flawless. except there was a bootup problem
I had to netboot to Dapper, and then upgrade to Edgy.
I'm still crossing my fingers.
Eh it's just flashier, it actually to me doesn't boot up any faster then Dapper did.
Haha. Edgy is trying to be your mom.
If you have any problems go to www.ubuntuforums.org and look for help.
i always do :-)
I only come to irc if everything else fails (like rtfm, rtfm more, rtfm more once again, reading forums, ..)
